item.title: Dolphins fire coach McDaniel after 7-10 season
item.description: The Dolphins have fired head coach Mike McDaniel after Miami finished 7-10, its second straight season missing the playoffs.

item.title: Secret sauce to Bills beating the Jaguars? A big key is the O-line
item.description: What makes up the Bills O-line unit's success and its diverse personalities off the field? Let them explain.

item.title: Best way to an Eagles defensive lineman's heart -- and performance? Meatballs
item.description: Vic Fangio introduced the Meatball Award this season for his defense to serve as that extra bit of motivation.

item.title: Sources: Bucs fire OC Grizzard, QB coach Lewis
item.description: Josh Grizzard has been fired by the Buccaneers after only one season as their offensive coordinator, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Sources: Hawks end Young era, send G to Wiz
item.description: The Hawks are trading four-time All-Star Trae Young to the Wizards for CJ McCollum and Corey Kispert, sources said.
